title: Runecraft/Level up table
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Runecrafting/Level up table
LevelNew abilities
Each level
  • Increases the chance of getting the rift guardian pet drop; increases at 200 million experience
1
  • Craft air runes and create air tiaras at the Air Altar
  • Create elemental tiaras at elemental altars
  • Create catalytic tiaras at catalytic altars
  • Create dark essence blocks (with 100% Arceuus favour)
  • Store essence in small pouches
2
  • Craft mind runes and create mind tiaras at the Mind Altar
3No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
4No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
5
  • Craft water runes and create water tiaras at the Water Altar
  • Required to complete Easy Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
6
  • Craft mist runes at the Air or Water Altar
7No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
8No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
9
  • Craft earth runes and create earth tiaras at the Earth Altar
  • Required to complete Easy Varrock Diary
10
  • Craft dust runes at the Air or Earth Altar
  • Required for Temple of the Eye
11
  • Craft 2 air runes per essence
12No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
13
  • Craft mud runes at the Earth or Water Altar
14
  • Craft fire runes and create fire tiaras at the Fire Altar
  • Craft 2 mind runes per essence
  • Build a  Rune case 1 (with 41 )
15
  • Craft smoke runes at the Air or Fire Altar
16No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
17No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
18No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
19
  • Craft 2 water runes per essence
  • Craft steam runes at the Fire or Water Altar
20
  • Craft body runes and create body tiaras at the Body Altar
21No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
22
  • Craft 3 air runes per essence
23
  • Craft lava runes at the Fire or Earth Altar
  • Required to complete Medium Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
24No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
25
  • Store essence in medium pouches
26
  • Craft 2 earth runes per essence
27
  • Craft cosmic runes and create cosmic tiaras at the Cosmic Altar (with Lost City completed)
  • Aid the Guardians of the Rift (with Temple of the Eye completed)
28
  • Craft 3 mind runes per essence
29No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
30
  • Required for The Slug Menace
31No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
32No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
33
  • Craft 4 air runes per essence
34No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
35
  • Craft 2 fire runes per essence
  • Craft chaos runes and create chaos tiaras at the Chaos Altar
  • Required for What Lies Below
36No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
37No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
38
  • Craft 3 water runes per essence
39No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
40
  • Craft astral runes at the Astral Altar (with Lunar Diplomacy completed)
41No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
42
  • Craft 4 mind runes per essence
  • Infuse splitbark gauntlets into swampbark gauntlets at the Nature Altar (after reading a runescroll of swampbark)
  • Infuse splitbark boots into swampbark boots at the Nature Altar (after reading a runescroll of swampbark)
43No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
44
  • Craft 5 air runes per essence
  • Craft nature runes and create nature tiaras at the Nature Altar
  • Build a  Rune case 2 (with 41 )
  • Required to complete Hard Karamja Diary
45No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
46
  • Craft 2 body runes per essence
  • Infuse splitbark helms into swampbark helms at the Nature Altar (after reading a runescroll of swampbark)
47No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
48
  • Infuse splitbark bodies into swampbark bodies at the Nature Altar (after reading a runescroll of swampbark)
  • Infuse splitbark legs into swampbark legs at the Nature Altar (after reading a runescroll of swampbark)
49No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
50
  • Store essence in large pouches
  • Required for Devious Minds
51No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
52
  • Craft 3 earth runes per essence
53No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
54
  • Craft law runes and create law tiaras at the Law Altar
55
  • Craft 6 air runes per essence
  • Required for The Fremennik Exiles
56
  • Craft 5 mind runes per essence
  • Required to complete Hard Falador Diary
57
  • Craft 4 water runes per essence
58No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
59
  • Craft 2 cosmic runes per essence
  • Required to complete Hard Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
60
  • Infuse dragon boots into primordial boots (with 60 )
  • Infuse infinity boots into eternal boots (with 60 )
  • Infuse ranger boots into pegasian boots (with 60 )
61No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
62No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
63No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
64No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
65
  • Craft death runes and create death tiaras at the Death Altar (with Mourning's End Part II completed)
  • Required to complete Hard Ardougne Diary
66
  • Craft 7 air runes per essence
67No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
68No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
69No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
70
  • Craft 6 mind runes per essence
  • Craft 3 fire runes per essence
71No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
72No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
73No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
74
  • Craft 2 chaos runes per essence
75
  • Store essence in giant pouches
76
  • Craft 5 water runes per essence
  • Required to complete Elite Lumbridge & Draynor Diary
77
  • Craft 8 air runes per essence
  • Craft blood runes at the Blood Altar (with blood talisman or tiara) or Kourend's Blood Altar (with 100% Arceuus favour)
  • Infuse splitbark gauntlets into bloodbark gauntlets at the Blood Altar or Kourend's Blood Altar (after reading a runescroll of bloodbark)
  • Infuse splitbark boots into bloodbark boots at the Blood Altar or Kourend's Blood Altar (after reading a runescroll of bloodbark)
  • Required to complete Elite Kourend & Kebos Diary
78
  • Craft 4 earth runes per essence
  • Required to complete Elite Varrock Diary
79
  • Infuse splitbark helms into bloodbark helms at the Blood Altar or Kourend's Blood Altar (after reading a runescroll of bloodbark)
80No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
81
  • Infuse splitbark bodies into bloodbark bodies at the Blood Altar or Kourend's Blood Altar (after reading a runescroll of bloodbark)
  • Infuse splitbark legs into bloodbark legs at the Blood Altar or Kourend's Blood Altar (after reading a runescroll of bloodbark)
82
  • Craft 2 astral runes per essence
  • Required to complete Elite Fremennik Diary
83No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
84
  • Craft 7 mind runes per essence
85
  • Craft and store essence in the colossal pouch (with 56 )
86No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
87No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
88
  • Craft 9 air runes per essence
  • Required to complete Elite Falador Diary
89No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
90
  • Craft soul runes at the Soul Altar (with 100% Arceuus favour)
  • Build a  Rune case 3 (with 41 )
91
  • Craft 2 nature runes per essence
  • Required to complete Elite Karamja Diary
92
  • Craft 3 body runes per essence
93No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
94No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
95
  • Craft 6 water runes per essence
  • Craft wrath runes and create wrath tiaras at the Wrath Altar
  • Craft 2 law runes per essence
96No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
97No new abilities unlocked for free players or members
98
  • Craft 8 mind runes per essence
99
  • Skill mastery
  • Craft 10 air runes per essence
  • Craft 2 death runes per essence
  • Buy the Runecraft cape and hood from Aubury, and wear them
v • d • e
Level up tables
Free-to-play
Combat
  • Attack
  • Strength
  • Defence
  • Ranged
  • Prayer
  • Magic
  • Hitpoints
Other
  • Cooking
  • Crafting
  • Firemaking
  • Fishing
  • Mining
  • Runecraft
  • Smithing
  • Woodcutting
Member
  • Agility
  • Construction
  • Farming
  • Fletching
  • Herblore
  • Hunter
  • Slayer
  • Thieving
